name: gazzetta.it nuova versione (giugno 2010)
description:
Toglie il superfluo lasciando solo gli articoli


aggiornato ai mondiali 2010
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("gazzetta.it") {


div [id="header"],
div [class="bodycontent"] 
   { background: #fff !important; }  
  

/* HOMEPAGE */
div [class="menu-mobile menu-left"],
div [class="menu-town menu-left"],
div [class="menu-linx menu-left"],
div [class="banner750x90"],
div [class="infospace"],
div [id="newsticker"],
div [class="miniplayer-txt"],
div [id="rimandi_mondiale2010"],
div [id="newsticker-switch"],
div [id="meteobox"],
div [id="newsnavi"],
div [class="bannertotal check-oas"],
div [class="input-gray left base in-text"],
div [id="metanavi"],
div#flash,
div [id="top-main"], /* BARRA LIVE TEMPO REALE */
div#vxFlashPlayer,  /* VIDEO DEL GIORNO */
div [class="rubrica clear"],
div [class="photogallery"],
div [class="autopromo pad_20px_right"],
div [class="autopromo"],
div#bodybottom,   /* TUTTA LA COLONNA DI DESTRA */
div#footer,
div#rightcol,
div#box-blog-esterno,
div [class="poll clearfix"], /* SONDAGGI */
div [class="shadowbox clear"],
div [class="sponsored-home"],
/* ARTICOLI */
div [class="sponsored"],
div [id="box-sponsor"],
div [id="box-green-double"],
div [id="box-blu"],
div [class="brand-probabili"],
div [id="gazzaspace-widget-all"],
div [id="photogallery clearfix"],
div [class="box-servizi-icone-container"],
div [class="trailer clearfix left"],
div [class="events-gazzetta-container"],
div [class="photogallery clearfix"]

 { display: none !important;}

}
